main.domain.collaborativeRecommender
Class LMSRecommender

java.lang.Object
  main.domain.StandardLMSRecommender
      main.domain.collaborativeRecommender.LMSRecommender
All Implemented Interfaces:
jcolibri.cbraplications.StandardCBRApplication
public class LMSRecommender
extends StandardLMSRecommender

Single-Shot learning objects recommender in an e-learning environment (like Learning Management Systems) obtaining a description from the profile of the user and scoring cases using collaborative recommendation.
This recommender uses a collaborative retrieval algorithm. These collaborative algorithms return items depending on the recommendations of other users. They require an special organization of the case base to be executed.
Summary:

  • Type: Single-Shot
  • Case base: learningObjectCases
  • One off Preference Elicitation: Profile
  • Retrieval: Collaborative + topKselection
  • Display: In table to select the most appropriate by the user

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tell Mueller-Pettenpohl
